thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning from London and the WSJ CEO Council, where I am with global business leaders and policy makers to discuss trade, economics, security, Brexit, technology, cybersecurity and many other topics. Follow along with us here.
Rock the House
House Speaker Paul Ryan said he would retire when his term ends in January, sparking a succession battle and rattling Republicans who expect a fierce struggle to maintain their majority in the midterm elections in November. Mr. Ryanâ€™s exit, less than three years into his tenure as...
